characterDescription:
Kyril is responsible for inspecting the ships in and out of Celebrant in Shadesmar. Mentioned by the dock registrar, an official inspection of ships happens at the first hour of every day.
Each inspection usually takes only thirteen minutes, but that of Ico's ship takes longer. Then, the ship is set on fire, presumably by the Fused looming over Kyril.

characterDetails.Appearance: He is composed of vines and crystal.
characterDetails.Character: The docks registrar has said that in addition to the Fused, Kyril might be mad too, because when he gets angry ... !
